timeline.bodyText: should we actually do LogEvent.warn here with some guidance on reporting this, so that we may identify misbehaving servers by user reports?
timeline.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText: I still think this is a good idea to identify registries that are acting strange. But up to you.
replies.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText: Sorry, I missed this comment. I thought about that, and I agree logging a warning will be very valuable to us. But I think a warning should be something actionable and fixable on the user side, so that's my hesitation. I've seen some people regard a warning seriously (probably because of a 0-warning policy auto-enforced by some system). Gathering information is really useful to us, but I feel we should be careful for dual-purposing a warning.
